summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement in the amount of Three Hundred Thousand Dollars ($300,000) with the Office of Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention for enhanced investigation and response to Internet crimes against children; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2000 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and establishing positions in the public safety civil service; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
